declarations.description: Web component that enables you to dynamically update a fieldâ€™s `datalist` with values retrieved from a URL as the user types
declarations.name: DynamicDatalistElement

events.name: dynamic-datalist:ready
events.description: Fired when the component is initialized

events.name: dynamic-datalist:update
events.description: Fired when the datalist is updated with new options

events.name: dynamic-datalist:error
events.description: Fired when an error occurs fetching options

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: HTTP method (get or post, default: get)

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: Variable name for the query value (default: query)
